title: [oc 6.0] maximum upload file size via desktop client is limited to 2gb
body:
as far as i remember, i used to be able to upload files that are greater than 2 gb when i uploaded through the desktop client. it now seems that with oc 6.0 the upload via desktop client is also capped at 2 gb? (as defined in the administrator's setting) i just uploaded a couple of files that were much bigger than 2 gb and it says on the web interface that the size of these files is 2 gb. is this a bug or is this how it is supposed to work? i suppose it's quite important for many of the users that they're able to upload files that are bigger than 2 gb in size, at least through the client.

i'm using the client version 1.4.2.

[update]
this still occurs with oc 6.0a and desktop client 1.5.
